meanings.definition: Skillful or expert in a particular craft or trade.
meanings.sent1: Her craftsmanlike pottery was admired by all who saw it.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter's craftsmanlike work on the furniture was evident in its quality.
meanings.sent3: The chef's craftsmanlike approach to baking cookies made them taste even better.
meanings.sent4: His craftsmanlike precision in assembling the model ship was like watching a master at work.
meanings.sent5: The artist's craftsmanlike brushstrokes brought the painting to life.

meanings.definition: Showing the skill or attention to detail typical of a craftsman.
meanings.sent1: The tailor's craftsmanlike stitching on the dress was flawless.
meanings.sent2: The watchmaker's craftsmanlike repair restored the antique clock to its former glory.
meanings.sent3: The gardener's craftsmanlike pruning of the bushes made the garden look neat and tidy.
meanings.sent4: Her craftsmanlike eye for color combinations made her quilts stand out.
meanings.sent5: The musician's craftsmanlike performance captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: Done with care and precision, as if done by a skilled craftsman.
meanings.sent1: The chef's craftsmanlike plating of the dish made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent2: The architect's craftsmanlike attention to detail ensured the building's structural integrity.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's craftsmanlike explanation of the concept made it easy for the students to understand.
meanings.sent4: Her craftsmanlike handling of the delicate fabric prevented any tears.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic's craftsmanlike repair of the engine made the car run smoothly again.
